feed.title: LF-Air
feed.subtitle: RSS feed based on RSS and LLM.

entry.title: Vite report on Tue, 17 Oct 2023 08:03:38
entry.summary:
Tech:
- LinkedIn employees discovered a mysterious list of around 500 names over the weekend. On Monday, workers said those on the list were laid off.
- Tech leaders are pulling out of a CEO's conference over remarks he made about Israel.
- Pixel 6 owners who use multiple profiles run into problems with Android 14.
- Web Summit derailed by founder’s public fight with those supporting Israel in Hamas war.
- Archer Aviation to launch air taxis in Abu Dhabi in 2026.
- Soon You Can Play Blurry N64 Games In 4K On The Mysterious Analogue 3D.

Business:
- McDonald's caught up in Israel-Hamas war as franchisees in the Middle East pledge aid to different sides.
- Former tech CEO being sued for defrauding JPMorgan has hit back with dramatic allegations.
- The House Republican Conference has been built for chaos since the 1990s. It only took one slim majority for that to blow up on them.
- Billionaire founder of Victoria's Secret pulls funding from Harvard, accusing the school of 'dismal failure' to take a stand for Israel.
- Werner Herzog on beer, yoga, and what he would ask God.
- Trump fraud judge cracks 'what's sauce for the goose...' joke in response to complaint about Michael Cohen's anti-Trump tweets.

AI:
- Prosecutors say Sam Bankman-Fried got shady doctor to prescribe Adderall as judge denies greater access to pills during trial.
- The sound of a human voice is more scary to animals in the Savanna than lions, dogs, or guns, a study found.
- Low serotonin levels might explain some Long Covid symptoms, study proposes.

Other:
- Congressional candidate Wiley holds meet and greet in Corsicana - Corsicana Daily Sun.
- 2025 WR CJ Wiley holds early Georgia offer, talks recent visit to Athens - 247Sports.
- Analysis of silver nanoparticles by flame atomic absorption... - John Wiley & Sons.
- ALJ Declines to Rubber Stamp EB Position on License Revocation - Wiley Rein.
- Long-time Family Court judge honored with plaque dedication in Mercer County - WVVA.
- Candidate Profile: Brian Wiley, Guilford Board of Assessment Appeals - Patch.
- Where to watch Cowboys vs. Chargers live streams for Monday Night Football.
- Halley’s Comet, Last Seen In 1986, Will Unleash ‘Shooting Stars This Weekend—How To Watch.
- Gong CEO Amit Bendov On Netanyahu And The Israel-Hamas War’s Impact.
- Laurel Lord will bless Israel | Letters to the Editor | leader-call.com - leader-call.com.

Insights:
- The conflict between Israel and Hamas has had repercussions in various industries, including tech and business.
- LinkedIn faced internal issues with layoffs, while tech leaders boycotted a conference due to controversial remarks about Israel.
- The Pixel 6 faced compatibility issues with Android 14, and the Web Summit faced disruptions due to the founder's public fight.
- McDonald's franchisees in the Middle East pledged aid to different sides of the Israel-Hamas conflict.
- Legal battles and allegations involving CEOs and fraud have emerged.
- The House Republican Conference faced chaos, and a billionaire founder pulled funding from Harvard.
- AI-related news included a case involving prescription drugs and a study on the impact of human voices on animals.
- Other topics ranged from sports events to celestial phenomena and personal opinions on Israel.
